segments.text: Excuse me ! What time is it ? My watch stopped .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . I set it by the radio this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , can you tell me what the date it is today , and what day it is , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's the 10th and on the Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S2
